verbose_text: Given our data showing that anti-DSG IgA B cells either develop independently of or switch directly from anti-DSG IgG B cells, and literature showing that TGF-beta, BAFF, and APRIL are not elevated in PV, anti-DSG IgA1 and IgA2 are likely an epiphenomenon in PV, formed in mucosal lymphoid tissues or epithelia by IgA class-switch mediators.
evidence: BAFF, and APRIL are not elevated in PV
